article_title: Obama’s Comedy Sketch to Promote Obamacare Has Been Nominated for an Emmy
article_text:
President Barack Obama’s Internet sketch to promote Obamacare has been nominated for an Emmy Award.

The “Between Two Ferns” mock interview skit with comedian Zach Galifianakis is up for best outstanding short-format live-action entertainment program. Emmy nominees were announced Thursday.

Obama’s appearance in the sketch was part of a White House promotional campaign to increase the number of young people enrolling in Obamacare.

article_summary:
President Barack Obama’s Internet sketch to promote Obamacare has been nominated for an Emmy Award.
Obama’s appearance in the sketch was part of a White House promotional campaign to increase the number of young people enrolling in Obamacare.
The “Between Two Ferns” mock interview skit with comedian Zach Galifianakis is up for best outstanding short-format live-action entertainment program.
Emmy nominees were announced Thursday.
